Gerald is a comet goldfish (Carassius auratus). He was pronounced dead on March 14, 2019, by Dr. Voss's veterinarian, Dr. Amara Singh, who has since asked to be removed from all promotional materials. His tank remains at 72°F. The filter is still running.

Current Analyst Roster · Q1 2026

The Team

Each analyst was selected for their specific behavioral portfolio. We do not hire. We observe, and then we know.

Gerald

Senior Partner · Comet Goldfish

Specializes in long-term market positioning. Predicted the 2018 crypto correction by refusing food for eleven days. Currently advises via ouija board with a 73.2% accuracy rate, which Dr. Voss notes is "higher than when he was embodied."

◆ STATUS: POST-CORPOREAL · STILL BILLING

Meredith

Chief Contrarian · Betta Fish

Attacks her own reflection. This is not a metaphor. We once presented a Fortune 500 merger proposal to her tank and she flared at the left column of the spreadsheet for forty minutes. The merger failed. She has a corner office (a 10-gallon with a ceramic castle).

STATUS: ACTIVE · FLARING

The Counsel of Diane

Risk Assessment · 14 Neon Tetras

Fourteen fish functioning as a single advisory body. When they school left, sell. When they school right, hold. When they scatter, Dr. Voss cancels all client meetings and drives to the coast. This has happened twice. Both times, there was a recession within six weeks.

STATUS: ACTIVE · SCHOOLING NORTHEAST

Rutherford

Venture Analysis · Plecostomus

Eats algae. Exclusively eats algae. Dr. Voss interprets this as "a rejection of speculative growth in favor of sustainable, bottom-feeding fundamentals." He has been attached to the same piece of driftwood since 2021. His clients have outperformed the S&P by 4.1%.

STATUS: ACTIVE · ATTACHED TO DRIFTWOOD

Consultation Protocol

All Meetings Take Place
at 3,000 Feet

Altitude removes ego from the equation. You cannot posture in a wicker basket. The fish travel in a pressurized portable aquarium unit (the Voss Ascension Tank™, patent pending). Meredith gets airsick. We do not discuss this.

Departure Helena's backyard, Ithaca, NY · 6:00 AM sharp
Duration 90 minutes or until Meredith flares, whichever comes first
Capacity 3 humans, 43 fish, 1 ouija board (Gerald insists)
Cancellation Wind above 12 mph, or if The Counsel of Diane scatters
Dress Code Business casual. No perfume. Rutherford is sensitive.
Insurance We are not insured. The balloon is named Penelope.

Dispute Resolution

Complaints Department

All complaints are processed through our proprietary Ouija-Based Resolution System (OBRS). Gerald serves as sole arbitrator. Decisions are final. Below is a recent transcript.

Session #0447 · January 12, 2026 · 2:14 AM · Helena's Kitchen

Client (Redacted), via email read aloud by Dr. Voss: "The Counsel of Diane told me to liquidate my entire portfolio. I lost $340,000. I want a refund."
Gerald, via ouija board: F — I — S — H — (long pause) — D — O — N — T — (pause) — L — I — E
Dr. Voss, interpreting: "Gerald says the fish don't lie. He's also moving toward the word 'PATIENCE.' Oh wait, no — that's 'PLANKTON.' He wants plankton. One moment."
Resolution: Complaint denied. Client offered 15% discount on next balloon ride. Gerald then spelled "G-O-O-D-B-Y-E" and the planchette stopped moving. Session concluded.

Common Questions

FAQ

Are the fish actual financial analysts?

The fish are fish. Dr. Voss is the analyst. The fish provide the data. This is not meaningfully different from how Bloomberg terminals work.

Is Gerald really dead?

Gerald's corporeal status is a matter of public record (Tompkins County veterinary filing #2019-03-1841). His advisory status is a matter of ongoing observation. The planchette moves. We do not move it. We have had this tested.

What happens if Meredith dies?

We do not entertain hypotheticals about Meredith.

Has anyone been injured during a balloon consultation?

Legally, we can say that no one has been injured during a balloon consultation. We cannot, at this time, make statements about the period immediately following balloon consultations. Penelope is a very old balloon.

Why is The Counsel of Diane 14 fish and not 12?

There were 12. Two more appeared. Dr. Voss did not purchase them. She has checked the tank seals. This is an open matter.

Can I visit the office?

The office is a shed. Trench Tier subscribers receive a key and a camp chair. All others may observe through the window. Dr. Voss asks that you do not tap the glass. Rutherford is sensitive and Meredith will flare, which skews the data.
